title: Profit in PC attracts firm entry, lowers price

content.question: If individual firms in a perfectly competitive market are earning positive economic profits, the number of firms and the price of the product in the market will most likely change in which of the following ways in the long run?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
